title: Is Yuumi's kit inspired from a mere mobile game?
body:
This is also ironically the game that got sued by Riot for copyright(Mobile Legends). 

If you look at the character(hero) Angela, she has almost the exact same abilities, just switched around and different effects like shields, healing and roots in different abilities.

replies.body:
["Yuumi is lazy"](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/z9jj8k06-yuumi-is-lazy) according to this, she's a mashup of Rakan, Kayle, Ekko and Zoe.
["congratz you made a cat skin of lulu"](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/iEtkkOt1-congratz-you-made-a-cat-skin-of-lulu) According to this, it's Lulu with Amumu, Rammus and Rakan (again).
["Sooo, Yuumi's ult looks nothing new, rather copied from another champ"](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/pRd4xJHB-sooo-yuumis-ult-looks-nothing-new-rather-copied-from-another-champ) According to this, she also has a Sona Ultimate.
You say the whole design is stolen from a mobile game.

So who is right? All of you? That's 8 unique champions with Rakan named twice, and as a bonus a hero from another game. Then you would have to congratulate the designers because they were able to mash all these things together and still create something coherent in both lore and gameplay.
Sorry, I had to post here again, to show how ridiculous the whole thing has gotten.

Wait...mobile legends is still alive?!? I thought riot sued it up all dry...
The game is a pure rip off, the voice like "mega kill" is cringe, even the advertising of the game is cringe.
No, it's pretty much Abathur's kit from Heroes of the Storm.
hmm.. angela is not a cat..
